import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const Stage1 = ({ onNext }) => { return (

Our Anniversary

💕

A love letter & adventure just for you

💌

My love,

Two years ago today, we met behind the Zara cashier counters, and my life hasn't been the same since. From our first date at Lido Bayside, to the day I told you 'I love you' at Superblue, you've been my best friend, my partner, and my greatest blessing.

As we chase our dreams together at FIU — you in Finance, me in Computer Science — I want to remind you that no matter where life takes us, I'll always be your biggest supporter and your biggest fan.

This little scavenger hunt is my way of saying: our love is an adventure. And today, you get to go on one just for us.

Happy Anniversary ❤️

Love,
Rickny

Start the Hunt 💕
↓

Let the adventure begin!
); }; export default Stage1;
